regen.absent_element: procedure for reconnection request by non-lead drivers after call failure
regen.new_specification: After a call fails in a cab that is not the lead cab, the driver in that cab shall initiate a call to the lead cab and request reestablishment of the communication.

regen.absent_element: protocol for handling call failure in non-lead cabs
regen.new_specification: The driver in the affected cab shall call the lead cab to request reestablishment of the connection when a call fails.

regen.absent_element: handling for call failure to cabs other than the lead vehicle
regen.new_specification: If the call fails to any cab other than the lead traction vehicle, the driver in that cab shall call the lead cab to request reestablishment of the call.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
